subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Some people get all the luck. While Cristiano Ronaldo canoodles the night away with Paris Hilton in Los Angeles, Kaká, his putative teammate at Real Madrid, sweats it out at the Confederations Cup in South Africa.
snippet: Some people get all the luck. While Cristiano Ronaldo canoodles the night away with Paris Hilton in Los Angeles, Kaká, his putative teammate at Real Madrid, sweats it out at the Confederations Cup in South Africa.
